name: node-js-code-step-by-step
description: - Node is not a language - This is a Server (Runtime) Environment - Node JS can connect with databases - Code and sytax is very similar to JavaScript but not exactly the same - Node JS is free and open-source - Node JS uses Chrome's V8 Engine to execute code - Node JS is mostly used for creating API's - We can connect the same database with Web App and Mobile App - Node JS is superfast for creating API's - With Node JS and JavaScript, you can become Full Stack Developer
